name: Caden WOODWORTH
text: Pretty tasty pizza, at a very good price! The pizza normally takes about 20-35 minutes, but it‚Äôs always worth the wait. I would come here again.

name: Mark Gruell
text: Fast friendly service! -- You just got to love the flavored crusts!!! MAKES THE PIZZA SO WONDERFUL!!!!

name: T Light
text: Double cheese pizza wasn't all that cheesy. Everything else was good

name: Martha Rosales
text: Always on time and never go over cooked. Just right..

name: J.L. S.
text: Food quality was average, but a staff member rose their voice to us when we entered the lobby to get our pizza. Apparently the lobby was closed and they asked if we could read the sign on the door. To be fair, their door had at least 10 signs with different notes and instructions. Will never go back.

name: Catherine Wesley-Ottarson
text: More Pizza Sauce would have garnered them 5 stars. I want my Pizza Swimming in Sauce....js

name: William Watts
text: Had a half cooked calzone delivered to me at work. I ask for a refund instead of a replacement since my lunch is over and I was told I'd have to come into the to get my refund. What do you folks not understand about I cant leave work and it was your mistake to rectify not mine. Loyal customer lost :(

name: Gerald Allred
text: Ordered right there, they said it would be 20 minutes.. while I was waiting had several employee's asked me if I have been helped, you don't see that any more!!! I give this place 5 Star +++

name: Julie Sheldon
text: It is hard to make a pizza my husband doesn't like, he especially likes Hungry Howie's Pizza, the one in Lansing that is.  After moving to Eaton Rapids we were excited to see our favorite, but it is just plain terrible, cardboard pizza. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Kyle Hayter
text: The online ordering system is the worst that I have ever encountered.  Makes you reset password every time, and then that doesn't even work...

name: William Lentz
text: Orders delivered perfect every time

name: Brent Southerling
text: Very good food.

name: nikki Tyrnow
text: Usually is my favorite pizza but last night ordered 2 pizzas and bread sticks. The pizzas were supposed to have pepperoni but did not, and the bread sticks were burnt! Super bummed about it all! I dont enjoy wasting my money.

name: Ramon Garza
text: They have a good menu and we've never had any issues with their service.

name: Shawne Modert
text: Deep dish is the best!!!

name: Jena Brown
text: Friendly Staff. Quick Service. Delicious Food.

name: Jack Judy
text: Hungry Howie's is decent pizza, but not the best I've had. The have a variety of flavored crusts, which is a plus.

name: Karla Darnell
text: Love the taste of their pizza and their crazy bread

name: Jennel Lowery
text: This place is really a let down! We ordered one pizza and a salad for delivery on a Thursday evening at 6:05 and it is 7:44 and still no pizza! We called 40 mins ago and were told they were on the way (we only live 5 mins away) I guess we won‚Äôt tip next time until the pizza is delivered!

name: John S
text: Location is hit or miss, mostly miss. Pizza's always seem to look thrown together like making the orders is an inconvenience to the employees. Most of my orders have been missing the jalapeno cheese dipping sauce and it's not worth arguing ‚Ä¶More

name: Joseph Halsey
text: I was so disappointed in the steak sub. I will not order it ever again. Not enough cheese to stick in your eye, and the bread it was on was not cut properly. Sucks to be them. I wont be back

name: Jessica Causie
text: I love going in when Will is working. Everything always comes out good and on top of that, he's always super friendly.

name: Jamie Kinyon
text:
The gluten free chicken bacon ranch was excellent. And the hubby liked his gluten tolerant pizza as well!!
Use the online app to get points towards free pizza and always use a coupon ‚Ä¶More

name: Sara Walters
text: Always quick and always hot when I pick it up

name: jania Herrin
text: The most amazing sub's ever!!! I would eat this all day every day if I could üòç‚ù§Ô∏èüëå

name: Donald Jory Jr.
text: I'm a Delivery Driver here, so I probably eat more Hungry Howie's food than the average guy. I probably see a lot more behind the counter than the average guy, as well. I see how business comes in unpredictible highs & lows, often to ‚Ä¶More

name: Hootie Hoo
text: Pretty legit for a Hungry Howie's.  I never get sick when I eat at this location!üçª

name: Allen P
text: Quick fast and tasty

name: Michelle Long
text: Awesome service

name: Joshua Curtis
text: Normally a good place to go, but this visit had me waiting 25 minutes for an order of cheese bread that was missed as part of my 3 pizza order. They offered a free sauce for my time.

name: Chris Foster
text: Worst pizza I've ever received by far!! Ordered a deep dish and it was burnt! Not to mention the deep dish crust was soggy!! Terrible taste and consistency... rather drive to the next town to get a real deep dish with flavor!

name: Aaron Lewis
text: Great cheeseless pizza. Thanks!

name: Mary Ann Metler
text: Great Pizza. Love the individual pizza's!

name: Tyler Grosvenor
text: I really appreciate you guys being open until midnight and delivery my pizza at 12:15am. You guys rock!

name: Megafilm Studios
text: How could I not give this 5/5 it's pizza

name: Adam Baker
text: Great place.  Friendly people.  Try the stuffed crust - you won't regret it.

name: Susan Bidelman
text: Took good care of me.

name: Jason Fehrman
text: Good food fast and friendly service.

name: Troy Rowlee
text: Good food but pricey.

name: John Schultz
text: First time at this location and wasnt too impressed. Ordered a pepperoni and ham, not much ham on the pizza. Had no jalapeno cheese for the bread. Food tasted good so it wasn't a total lost cause. Just disappointed

name: crazy pokemon
text: I love their pizza

name: Sarahlynn Kelly
text: There are many Hungry Howie's pizza places in the area but we go out of our way to the Eaton Rapids Hungry Howie's just for their three cheeser bread! They somehow make it different than everybody else's and it is worth the 40 minute drive to have a fresh piping-hot three cheeser bread with ranch on the side! We eat in the parking lot.

name: Autumn Jennings
text: I generally order online, usually a good experience. Driver is always on point, even on busy nights, and always makes a point to thank me for my order. I did once order a pizza an hour before closing, kinda felt like whoever made the pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Rich Turner
text: Close and great pizza

name: May Bee
text: Been ordering there for at least two years. Half the time the pizza is overcooked and the crust is over seasoned. Today they completely screwed my order up and I WILL NOT give them another dime of my hard earned money.

name: Christopher Henrys
text: Pizza is always dry, either overcooked or lacking sauce. Revolving staff. Prices too high for the mediocre product.

name: J J
text: Love the stuffed crust pizza!

name: Damion Farnum
text: The pizza is ok. Way to over priced and the sauce is watered down. Service is slow. It takes way to long for a pizza with one topping to get cooked if they cook it all the way. Little Ceasars is cheaper and tastes better. Lower the prices like lc and improve the sauce and you may just sell more pizza.

name: robert gorham
text: I ordered a pizza an hour ago...called back , and it has not been dispatched yet. the child on the phone say's if my pizza dose not arrive to call her back and ask for a refund....what a load, my pizza finally arrived 80 minutes after ordering, the driver was delightful and appologetic . please fix some obvious problems. thanks

name: Matty Cloud
text: Delivery is slow i end up with a overcooked cold pizza any time I've  ordered , it doesn't matter who answers the phone when you order they're all rude and act like there doing you a favor just because they answered the phone and honestly ‚Ä¶More

name: Terry Morgan
text: good cajun crust

name: Justin Redoutey
text: Went there tonight "12/22" and the 2 ladys working there where amazing to both me and my son thank you both and i will for sure be going back

name: Rebecca B
text: Favorite pizza in Eaton Rapids. Great service.

name: matt sairls
text: Good pizza delivery fast

name: Terry Matthews
text: Most of the time there pizza is on point. However the last time they didn't dice up the chicken, thus it wasn't evenly distributed on the pizza, thus making some parts barren of toppings, thus making me upset, thus only three stars

name: Jon Hendrickson
text: We are done trying this place. They have gotten our order wrong a few times and last time we went my wife and I were sick for three days.

name: David Ford

text: If you are all about crust, this is the place for you. If you are all about the toppings, go to Little Caesars.
